title: NFTs will remain a permanent fixture in society | Opinion

title: BLUR’s Price Drops After Whale’s $894K Sale, LINK Climbs 6+%
description:
Earlier today, a whale sold 1.78 million BLUR and spent $1.25 million to buy 82K LINK tokens. At press time, BLUR’s price was down by 2.86%, which left the altcoin trading at $14.82. The whale’s purchase of LINK could be behind the token’s more than 6% price increase over the past day. Earlier today, the […]
